scripts.cp:temp: cp -r ./temp/* ./src && npm run prettier && npm run lint:fix && rm -rf ./temp/*
scripts.publish:npm: npm run build && npm publish --access public --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.publish:npm-beta: npm run build && npm publish --access public --tag beta --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org/
scripts.publish:local: npm run build && npm publish --access public --registry=http://172.16.240.221:8081/repository/local/
